verb.description: Make a formal application or request.
examples: you need to apply to the local authorities for a grant
a number of people have applied to vote by proxy
the offer does not apply to unionized workers

verb.description: Put or spread (something) on a surface.
examples: the sealer can be applied to new wood

verb.description: Give one's full attention to a task; work hard.

origin: Late Middle English: from Old French aplier, from Latin applicare fold, fasten to, from ad- to + plicare to fold.
